title.rendered: “IDF Strikes: Decimating Hamas Terrorist Operations in the Gaza Strip – A Detailed Account”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

Fighter jets eliminated two terrorists who tried to carry out attacks on Israeli territory; Another team of terrorists from the Hamas terrorist organization was eliminated in Nuseirat area; 162nd Division is operating against terrorist infrastructures in a strip in the center of the Gaza Strip.

The combat team of the Paratroopers Brigade is operating in a strip in the center of the Strip. Throughout the last day, the forces eliminated several terrorists and destroyed terrorist infrastructures.

In one of the attacks, the brigade forces identified two terrorists who tried to carry out attacks on Israeli territory. Air Force fighter jets attacked the terrorists, destroying the launch pit and the weapon storage that one of the terrorists used.

In addition, Air Force fighter jets attacked a terrorist infrastructure in Shati area where terrorists from the Hamas terrorist organization who carried out attacks on IDF forces in the center of the Strip were based.

Furthermore, an aircraft of the Air Force, in combination with the 215th Artillery Brigade, precisely attacked and eliminated yesterday (Wed) a terrorist team from the Hamas terrorist organization in the Nuseirat area.

Over the past day, Air Force fighter jets and aircraft attacked more than 30 targets of terrorist organizations across the Gaza Strip, including weapon storages, terrorist teams, military buildings, and other terrorist infrastructures.

Attached is documentation from IDF attacks in the Gaza Strip: https://bit.ly/3xS2hXG

Pictures from the forces’ activity in the Gaza Strip are attached: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC250420247409347356
